avatar.noAvatar: This user does not have an avatar.

langs.langSet: Server lang set to `{lang}` with success !

purge.mustBeInRange: You must provide at least 2 and at most 100 messages to delete.

money.givedFaucet: {gived}‚Ç¨ added to your account ! New balance: {newBalance}‚Ç¨
money.givedMoney: {quantity} gived to user! New balance of {user}: {newBalance}‚Ç¨
money.removedMoney: {quantity} removed from user! New balance of {user}: {newBalance}‚Ç¨
money.cooldown:
You have to wait {minutes}min between every execution of this command (unless you have a TARDIS).

Remaining: {remaining}

about.about:
Handles (formerly known as Gus) is a multi-function Discord bot delivered with a set of features and commands made for you. Written in TypeScript for Node. js using powerful libraries such as Discord. js, LowDB and Express, Handles is able to meet all your needs regarding your Discord community.

 Learn more:
    - GitHub: https://git.io/handles
    - Website: https://callmegus.xyz
    - Discord: https://bot.discord.io/handles

feedback.cantFindChan: Sorry but we can't find the feedback channel. Contact an administrator for further informations.
feedback.thanksForFeedback: Thank you for your feedback ! We really want to know what is good or bad about our bot. This is the only good way to improve our work :smile:

poll.question: **{question}**
poll.voteByClick: Vote by clicking on the reactions below
poll.pleaseIgnore: Please ignore the first vote, it is only to display the reactions. (Ex: if the first answer shows 4 votes, the actual result is 3)

setwelcome.titleSet: The welcome message's title has been changed to ```{title}```
setwelcome.bodySet: The welcome message's body has been changed to ```{body}```

roles.invalidAge: You must have at least 18 years old to access this role !
roles.charsOnly: Only the following characters may be used: a-Z 0-9 -_ and spaces
roles.useOtherName: A link with this name already exists. Choose a different name and try again.
roles.created: The role `{name}` has been linked to the channel {channel} ! Join it with `{prefix}role join {name}` !
roles.doesntExists: The role doesn't exists. Use `{prefix}roles list` to get a list of available roles.
roles.cantAccess: You cannot join this role with this command.

help.title: Configure links between a role and a channel.
help.desc: Restrict access to channels to a role. It's also possible to obtain the role via a command (configurable).

add.title: {prefix}roles add
add.desc:
Syntax: `{prefix}roles add <nom> [--accessible OR -a]`
Create a new link between a role and a channel. (Automatic creation of role and channel if non-existent)

list.title: {prefix}roles list
list.desc:
Syntax: `{prefix}roles list`
Displays available role-channel links.

profile.alreadyExists: An input with this name already exists!
profile.max: You have reached the maximum number of input possible!
profile.added: Input added! Configure it on your profile with `{prefix}profile set {name} <value>`.
profile.doesntExist: No input with this name have been found!

help.describeYourself: Describe yourself in your beautiful profile !
help.config: Configure the available inputs in the profiles and customize the allowed values (see wiki).
help.set: Configure an input on your profile. (max. 2040 characters)
help.unset: Delete an input on your profile.
help.view: Displays your profile or that of another user.

birthdate.notAnnounced: Birthdays will not be announced anymore!
birthdate.chanUpdated: Birthdays will be announced in the channel {channel}!

livenotif.configured: The following channels generate notifications when they are streaming:
livenotif.empty: No channel is configured to generate streaming notifications.
livenotif.doesntExist: The channel doesn't exist ! Check the name or the identifier.
livenotif.alreadyExists: The channel is already configured! You can delete it with the command `{prefix}livenotif delete {channel}.
livenotif.added: Channel successfully added! When the channel will be streaming, a notification will be sent in the configured channel (with the command `{prefix}livenotif channel #channel`).
livenotif.chanSet: Stream notifications will now be sent in the channel {channel}.

MessageHandler.levelup: Cheers {who}, you've reached the level {level}! You talk a lot :o
MessageHandler.first_cmdExed: Holy cow {who} ! This is your first command in this server :D +100XP
MessageHandler.first_msgSent: Congrats {who} ! This is your first message in this server :D +100XP

errors.needAdmin: You need to be an administrator in order to run this command !
errors.noDm: You can't execute this command outside a server.
errors.noPerm: You don't have the right permissions to execute this command !
errors.useHelpCommand: To get the list of the commandes, use `{prefix}help`.
errors.learnCMD: Learn how the command works using `{prefix}help`.
errors.basicError: Error while executing the command. Please contact an administrator
errors.sayception: You shouldn't do this if you don't want to be responsible for the quantum implosion of Handles' heart, that would create a deadly interdimensional black hole... Please don't :c

errors.noMusic: There is no music to skip ! Add musics with `{prefix}play <url>`

resp.author: Author
resp.cannotFindSearch: I can't find the music using gived keywords

help.returnToMain: Return to the main page with the ‚Ñπ button

misc.bracketsAndQuotes: The characters <> ou [] are for indicative purposes only, don't include them ! They indicate dynamic text and whether it's optional ([]) or not (<>).
misc.requestOfInfo: Attention. Message decoding. Message analysis proceeding. Information available. The message is a request for information.
